transcript: look at what the top guy does and do twice as much as that guy does be Kobe for whatever the job is he did three practices a day while everyone else did one or two because he wanted to get ahead and in the beginning he was worse than them and then he got as good as them and then he became better than them and he kept doing three practices a day until eventually no one could catch up the guy who's number one at whatever that business is probably works better than you and he works longer than you and so you can't just match him to get ahead because he'll always be happy you gotta match his current effort and then do your I'm gonna get ahead of you effort when he clocks out is when your work clocks in if you can really internalize this you're gonna Crush you're gonna win
